adversarial_findings.summary: Round2 found stale round1 anchoring; requires active pointer promotion to fresh review artifact.
adversarial_findings.risk: Governance decisions can be made on stale evidence.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Promote round2 artifact as active canonical red-team evidence and align gate/blocker pointers.

adversarial_findings.summary: Round2 found unresolved labels (`review|abstain`) included as training-eligible without explicit override policy.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Default export eligibility to false for `review|abstain` unless explicit uncertain-export override is present.

adversarial_findings.summary: Round2 requested explicit canonicalization command provenance.
adversarial_findings.risk: Canonical promotion steps are not replayable from evidence alone.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Record canonicalization commands and exit codes in command log and manifest.
